${mapPut("repositoryAction","workspaceName",getStringParameter("workspaceName"))} ${model.app.performRepositoryAction(model,model.pathInfo.getPath(model.pathInfo.getCurrentIndex()-1),"workspaceDelete")} <#if !model.app.isRepositoryAvaliable(model)> Ok ${model.setSession(null)} <#stop "repository closed for admin purpose, ignore exceptions from this request"> <@page_overview_title/>
<#if status??> ${status}
<#else> Workspace deleted successfully
Ok
